name: It Comes At Midnight
description:
You wake up in a familiar room. How long have you been here for?

It feels like you just woke up from a horrible nightmare.

A nightmare more real than you think...

Its coming...

Controls:

- WASD to Move

- Space to Use

- Mouse Click to Interact

Team:

- Code, Sound: Guilherme Sousa

- Art: Rodrigo Sousa, Gabriel Gérard
